---
title: "3D Solids Functions"
---

Functions for creating, manipulating, and visualizing 3D geometric solids and mesh structures.

## Basic 3D Shapes

- [cube](utilities/cube.html) - Create a 3D cube
- [cylinder](utilities/cylinder.html) - Create a 3D cylinder
- [sphere](utilities/sphere.html) - Create a 3D sphere
- [torus](utilities/torus.html) - Create a 3D torus
- [ellipse3D](utilities/ellipse3D.html) - Create a 3D ellipse

## Platonic Solids

- [tetrahedron](utilities/tetrahedron.html) - Create a tetrahedron (4 faces)
- [octahedron](utilities/octahedron.html) - Create an octahedron (8 faces)
- [dodecahedron](utilities/dodecahedron.html) - Create a dodecahedron (12 faces)
- [icosahedron](utilities/icosahedron.html) - Create an icosahedron (20 faces)

## 3D Mesh Operations

- [extrude](utilities/extrude.html) - Extrude a 2D shape into 3D
- [revolve](utilities/revolve.html) - Create 3D solid by revolution
- [loft](utilities/loft.html) - Create 3D surface by lofting through curves
- [replicant](utilities/replicant.html) - Replicate 3D objects
- [flatfv](utilities/flatfv.html) - Create flat face-vertex mesh
- [fv2fv](utilities/fv2fv.html) - Convert between face-vertex formats

## Grid & Surface to Mesh

- [grid2tri](utilities/grid2tri.html) - Convert grid to triangulated mesh
- [surf2fv](utilities/surf2fv.html) - Convert surface to face-vertex representation
